summary: Complete end-to-end testing of CyberSentinelle network intrusion detection system. All backend APIs (8/8 tests) passed. All frontend pages load correctly with charts displaying data. Prediction Demo Normal/Attack flows work correctly. 3D visualizations (Network Topology, Threat Visualization) render properly using canvas. Minor console warnings about chart dimensions but visuals render correctly.

design_issues.issue: Console warnings: 'width(-1) and height(-1) should be greater than 0' on chart initial render
design_issues.note: Charts render correctly after data loads - cosmetic console warning only

passed_tests: Backend: Dataset info endpoint - returns 5000 samples, features, label distribution
Backend: Dataset EDA endpoint - returns numeric_stats, feature_distributions (label, protocol_type), top_features
Backend: Model metrics endpoint - Random Forest accuracy 97.7%, Decision Tree accuracy 97.5%, ROC AUC 0.9971
Backend: Prediction endpoint with normal traffic - returns 'Normal' prediction correctly
Backend: Prediction endpoint with attack traffic - returns 'Attack' prediction with DoS Attack Detected
Backend: Clustering results endpoint - returns n_clusters, silhouette_score, pca_data, cluster_distribution
Backend: Monitor traffic endpoint - returns status
Frontend: Homepage loads with stats (97.7% precision, 125K+ échantillons, 41 features, 5 modèles)
Frontend: Dashboard EDA - 3D Network Topology canvas renders, Distribution des attaques bar chart displays data, Protocoles réseau pie chart shows tcp/udp/icmp, Top Features bar chart visible

Frontend: Model ML - Metrics cards show (Accuracy 97.70%, Precision 97.70%, Recall 97.70%, AUC 0.9971), 3D Threat Visualization canvas renders, Comparison chart, ROC Curve, Feature Importance chart all display

Frontend: Prediction - Demo Normal button loads normal parameters, Demo Attack button loads attack parameters, ANALYSER LE TRAFIC button works, Results display correctly (NORMAL/INTRUSION with confidence %)
Frontend: Clustering - Auto-loads with scatter plot (2 clusters visible), Silhouette score 0.0570, Clusters count 2, Cluster sizes bar chart displays
Frontend: Live Monitor page loads without errors
Frontend: Sidebar navigation persists and works on all pages

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages functional, all charts display data)

seed_data_creation: None required - backend auto-generates synthetic NSL-KDD data and trains models on first request
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Previous issues (empty charts, prediction errors) have been fixed. The app uses canvas-based 3D visualizations (NOT React Three Fiber) due to React 19 compatibility. Backend auto-trains models and runs clustering on first request. Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) are cosmetic only - charts render correctly after data loads. Prediction Demo Normal returns 'Normal' with ~76% confidence, Demo Attack returns 'Attack' with ~66% confidence and 'DoS Attack Detected' badge.
verification_screenshots: Dashboard EDA - 3D Network Topology and Distribution des attaques bar chart
Model ML - Metrics cards, 3D Threat Visualization, ROC Curve, Feature Importance
Prediction - Demo Attack result showing INTRUSION with 65% confidence
Clustering - 2D scatter plot with 2 clusters, metrics, cluster sizes
